title: Pelosi says China "will not isolate Taiwan" as drills ramp up near island
content:
1. Pelosi says China "will not isolate Taiwan" as drills ramp up near island  Axios
  2. Top US Democrat Nancy Pelosi defends visit to Taiwan amid Chinese anger - BBC News  BBC News
  3. China sends warships, jets close to Taiwan as tensions rise in strait  CNN
  4. Opinion | Chinese Ambassador Qin Gang: Pelosi's Taiwan visit was irresponsible  The Washington Post
  5. It's Not Just Pelosi. Why Are the U.S. and China Clashing Over Taiwan Now? | Opinion  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ペロシ、中国が「台湾を孤立させない」と発言、台湾付近での演習を強化
佩洛西说中国 "不会孤立台湾"，因为该岛附近的演习正在加强。
佩洛西說中國 "不會孤立臺灣"，因爲該島附近的演習正在加強。
